title: Germany, DFG: von Kaven Award 2025 Goes to Mathematician Andrii Mironchenko
snippet: Dr. habil. Andrii Mironchenko, Chair of Applied Mathematics at The University of Bayreuth, was awarded von Kaven Award, conferred by the Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG, German Research Foundation) in recognition of his outstanding research in mathematical systems theory.
